CustomField.description: Date of first (soft-credit gift) made by this Account. See "Combined First Gift Date" for date of first gift overall (i.e. hard or soft credit) from this Account. Calculated by NPSP Customizable Rollups.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Date of first (soft-credit gift) made by this Account. See "Combined First Gift Date" for date of first gift overall (i.e. hard or soft credit) from this Account. Calculated by NPSP Customizable Rollups.
CustomField.label: First Soft Credit Gift Date
